禓字的基本解释

禓
shāng
古代指强鬼（死于非命之鬼）。
驱逐强鬼的祭祀：“乡人禓。”

禓
yáng
道上之祭。

禓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáng］
［《廣韻》與章切，平陽，以。］
古谓道上之祭。
[②]［shāng］
［《廣韻》式羊切，平陽，書。］
古指强死鬼。亦指驱逐强死鬼之祭。

禓字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　禓； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页845第07
【廣韻】與章切【集韻】【韻會】余章切【正韻】移章切，?音陽。【說文】道上祭也。一曰道神。　又【廣韻】式羊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】尸羊切，?音商。逐强鬼也。【禮·郊特牲】鄕人禓。【註】禓强鬼，謂時儺索室，毆疫逐强鬼。　【集韻】或作?。

禓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
禓字的起名意思

暂无。

禓
Basic explanation of words
禓
shāng
In ancient times, it refers to a strong ghost (a ghost who died of a fate).
Sacrifice to expel strong ghosts: "Xianren Hu."
禓
yáng
Sacrifice on the road.
禓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáng］
["Guangyun" and chapter cut, Pingyang, to. ]
In ancient times, it is said that the sacrifice on the road.
[②]［shāng］
["Guangyun" style sheep cut, Pingyang, book. ]
Ancient refers to the strong dead ghost. Also refers to the sacrifice of expelling strong dead ghosts.

One said Taoism.　[Guangyun] style sheep cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] corpse sheep cut, sound quotient. Chasing strong ghosts too. 【Rite·Suburb Special Sacrifice】Fengren 禓. [Note] The strong ghost is called the exorcism room, fighting the epidemic and chasing the strong ghost.　【Jiyun】or make?.
